G

Game - Class in scripts
The Game class contains the core game logic for JPacMan, managing the GUI, characters, events, and game state, using a simple clock that runs 3 times for second
Game() - Constructor for class scripts.Game
Initialises the game, setting up the game board, characters, GUI, and event clock.
gameBoard - Variable in class scripts.Game
The 2D matrix representing the current state of the game board.
gameBoardDisplayJPanel - Variable in class scripts.GUI
Panel responsible for rendering the game board grid and all its graphical elements.
gameClock - Variable in class scripts.Game
The main game timer responsible for updating the game state every 300 ms.
gameEvents - Variable in class scripts.Game
Manages all game-related events such as collisions, teleportation, ghost spawning, and victory/defeat conditions.
GameEvents - Class in scripts
The GameEvents class handles various game mechanics and events in the JPacMan game, such as spawning ghosts, checking for game over conditions, teleporting characters through portals, and determining victory states.
GameEvents() - Constructor for class scripts.GameEvents
 
gameMapCopy - Static variable in class scripts.MatrixFromFileExtractor
A copy of the game board matrix, useful to reset the map without reloading the full matrix
getCoordinatesXY() - Method in class scripts.Character
Retrieves the current position of the character.
getcurrentDirectionXY() - Method in class scripts.Character
Retrieves the current movement direction of the character.
getDefaultCoordinatesXY() - Method in class scripts.Character
Retrieves the initial spawn position of the character.
getGameMapCopy() - Static method in class scripts.MatrixFromFileExtractor
Retrieves a deep copy of the original game map loaded from file.
getGhostColorLetter() - Method in class scripts.Ghost
Retrieves the letter associated with the ghost's color.
getInvincibility() - Static method in class scripts.Game
Retrieves the remaining invincibility cooldown.
getLives() - Static method in class scripts.Game
Retrieves the current number of lives.
getScore() - Static method in class scripts.Game
Retrieves the current score.
Ghost - Class in scripts
Represents a ghost character in the game.
Ghost(int[], int[], String) - Constructor for class scripts.Ghost
Initializes a Ghost instance with its position, direction, and unique color identifier.
ghostColorLetter - Variable in class scripts.Ghost
A single-letter string identifying the ghost's color.
ghosts - Variable in class scripts.Game
The array containing all active ghosts in the game.
ghostSpawner(Ghost[], GUI, int) - Method in class scripts.GameEvents
Spawns ghosts at designated intervals and updates the game state.
ghostSpawnerCooldown - Static variable in class scripts.Game
Cooldown timer controlling how frequently new ghosts can be spawned.
ghostSpawnerCooldownReset() - Static method in class scripts.Game
Resets the ghost spawn cooldown variable to its default value.
GUI - Class in scripts
The GUI class represents the graphical user interface for the JPacMan game.
GUI() - Constructor for class scripts.GUI
Initializes the GUI by setting up the game window and all graphical components.
